enhanced_by.reason: The 'remove' method operates on the map state, which is modified by 'put'. Ensuring the map has elements before removal is crucial.
Checking if the key exists before attempting to remove it can help validate the state and avoid unnecessary operations.
After removal, verifying that the key no longer exists in the map can confirm the operation's success.
Comparing the size of the map before and after removal can help verify that the element was indeed removed.
